The universal scorbutick pills, and radical purifier of nature. Operating by purgation and urine, with the greatest ease and success in various diseases and infirmities ... E. M.
1 sheet ([2] p.).
Printed for the undertakers, London, : 1675.
Caption title. With section entitled "The Antivenereal Pills, or Magnetick Remedy.". Author information provided by Wing. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
